products.product_description: The incredibly thin and light MacBook Air is now more powerful than ever. It features a brilliant Retina display, new Magic Keyboard, Touch ID, processors with up to twice the performance, faster graphics, and double the storage capacity. The sleek wedge-shaped design is created from 100 percent recycled aluminum, making it the greenest Mac ever.

products.product_brief_description: The most powerful 13-inch MacBook Pro ever.
products.product_description: The new MacBook Pro delivers game-changing performance for pro users. The powerful 8-core processor, stunning Retina display with True Tone technology, Touch Bar and Touch ID, ultrafast SSD, and all-day battery life make MacBook Pro the ultimate pro notebook.

The MacBook Pro 16 combines power, performance, and pro features. With a stunning 16-inch Retina display, ultrafast processors, next-generation graphics, the largest battery capacity ever in a MacBook Pro, a new Magic Keyboard, and massive storage, it's the ultimate pro notebook for the ultimate user.
